title: Workshop on Graph Theory-Based Science Learning Pathway Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced knowledge in scientific disciplines and understanding of basic graph theory
context.additional_context: Learners are office/managerial professionals requiring advanced science learning linked to their work, demanding a flexible learning environment using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of a graph theory-based learning path recommendation system.
Learners can design optimal learning paths by analyzing interdependencies among science domain learning objects.
Learners can independently construct learning paths required to solve real-world scientific project problems.

resources: Digital Learning Materials for Science Disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
